com.jed.actor

Class RectangleBoundary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jed.actor.Boundary
      • com.jed.actor.RectangleBoundary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Displayable

    public class RectangleBoundary
extends Boundary
    Concrete implementation of Boundary which represents a Rectangle. Use PolygonBoundary if you want a concrete implementation for a polygon that is not rectangle.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    jlinde, Peter Colapietro
